channel.title: Regression on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on A Hugo website

item.title: Time Series
item.description: The x axis represents time, while the y is variable of your choice. First we load the libraries library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(devtools) library(ggplot2) Then we must extract the data, in order to get the time series. query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR),color="black")+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR),color="blue")+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Through the Years")+ xlab("Year")+ ylab("Homeruns")
